parameters.name: Aggregator
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return only properties that support the aggregate feature in the configuration list. Valid values:

*   true: only returns properties that support the aggregate feature in the configuration list.
*   false: returns all properties in the configuration list.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description:
The configuration list type name. Valid values:

*   ACS:InstanceInformation
*   ACS:Application
*   ACS:File
*   ACS:Network
*   ACS:WindowsRole
*   ACS:Service
*   ACS:WindowsUpdate
*   ACS:WindowsRegistry
